executable.title: GenerateModel
executable.description: This program extract the airway wall and computes multiple airway wall metrics from a particle's VTK files using multiple approaches. The output is another particle's' VTK file.

string-enumeration.name: method
string-enumeration.label: Wall extraction method
string-enumeration.description: Method used for the wall computation. \ FWHM - Full Width at a Half Maximum \ ZC - Zero Crossing of the second order derivative \ PC - Phase Congruency Phase congruency is the recommended one.

boolean.name: inPlane
boolean.label: In-plane mode
boolean.description: Compute airway wall in-plane ignoring airway longitudinal axis.

boolean.name: saveAirwayImages
boolean.label: Save airway images
boolean.description: Save airway images (one per particle) for quality control purposes.
